name: Blackfaun
description: Blackfaun is a fast paced roguelike with RPG elements, featuring challenging combat and replayability. Players join a faun tasked with a mysterious quest to prove her worth as heiress to the crown. Vibrant colors and a rich soundtrack bring dungeons to life for a fully immersive experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows 8 Processor: Dual Core 2.0 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 400 or Equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows 8 Processor: Quad Core 2.5 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 400 or Equivalent DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
